name: Warp Soldier - July 2021 Demo
description:
Welcome to Warp Soldier! 2D retro monochrome Metroidvania with sick melee combos, cool mobility tricks, and a teleportation gimmick!

This here is a short demo that shows off an early zone in the game. Warp Soldier can be played with a mouse and keyboard or a gamepad (tho the latter hasn't been fully tested yet).

Controls:

Mouse + Keyboard:

  • A,D: move left and right
  • Space: Jump
  • S + Space: fallthrough semi-solid platforms
  • Left Click: Sword Attack, Continue Dialogue
  • Right Click: Kick Attack
  • Left + Rick Click (on certain sword combos): Ex-Attack
  • Space + Left/Right Click: Warptag Strike (once obtained)
  • Shift + W/A/S/D: Warp (once an enemy has been warp-tagged)
  • E: Interact
  • P/Esc: Pause

Gamepad (assumes XBox controller layout):

  • Left Stick: Move
  • A: Jump, Interact, Continue Dialogue
  • Down+A: fallthrough semi-solid platforms
  • B: Sword Attack
  • Y: Kick Attack
  • B+Y: (on certain sword combos): Ex-Attack
  • Right Bumper + B/Y: Warptag Strike (once obtained)
  • Left Bumper + A/B/X/Y: Warp (once an enemy has been warp-tagged)
  • Menu: Pause

Credits:

Main Developer: 

Mr. Thee (https://twitter.com/PhillipWitz)

Musicians:

hyakkulegger (https://twitter.com/SEGA_Uranus)

Cole Masaitis (https://twitter.com/ColeMasaitis)
